description:
A tracking device such as a LightBug or AirTag, included with the parent object.

Note that the tracking URLs for a given device can change, therefore implementers should use any URLs supplied rather than those cached from a previous shipment with the same device.
title: TrackingDevice

identifier.description: The device serial number or other globally unique identifier.

humanTrackingUrl.description: A URL where a human can, for example, see the device location on a map.

apiTrackingUrl.description: A URL where a computer can, for example, obtain the device's last known latitude and longitude.
